name: Line Running
description:
How far can you go? Line Runner will give you a chance to prove to yourself and your friends, that you have what it takes to go farther than anybody else!
In this very special side scrolling running game you can try to find all the achievements while you explore new place and go further every time! Use Game Center to challenge your friends and see and beat their records!
And look out for updates as new challenges, sceneries and other features will be given with every update!
